Introduction
This topic contains information about SC considerations involving digestive disabilities, including
considering circumstances of service when determining SC for gastrointestinal disorders
testing not required for SC for GERD
establishing SC for inguinal hernia
SC and recurrence of hemorrhoids
example of analyzing recurrence of hemorrhoids
other causes of liver damage
, and
fatty liver
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6 - Digestive Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section None
